createFakeJourney

public static Journey createFakeJourney(boolean makeTrain,
                                        int leng,
                                        Station firstSt,
                                        int startTime)
Method to generate random journey. If makeTrain is set to true a random train will be created and associated with the journey. leng specifies the amount of stops in the journey. There will be leng * 2 TrainStatuses in the journey since each stop has arrival and departure.

createFakeJourney

public static Journey createFakeJourney(boolean makeTrain)
Overloading fake journey method. Just creates a fakeJourney, up to 8 stops in length. makeTrain determines whether or not a random Train is made too.

createFakeJourney

public static Journey createFakeJourney()
Overloading fake journey method. Just creates a fakeJourney, up to 8 stops in length and with no station.

createFakeTrip

public static Journey[] createFakeTrip(int amount)
Create fake array of journeys, where one journey starts at the same station as where the last one ends.
